author: remm
msg: - 43479: Memory leak cleaning up sendfile connections (submitted by the bug reporter).
- 42925: No timeout for sendfile (fix TODO item that had been forgotten).

author: rajith
msg: The broker used window as default mode and the java client is using credit as default mode.
This resulted in a test failure.
I modified the java client to explictly state credit mode for sync receive.

author: joakime
msg: [MRM-493] Downloaded artifacts are stored in incorrect archiva-managed repository
Fixed by reseting dav servers on configuration save properly.
